message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  It's important to reach a deal quickly because the value decreases over time.
I think a 60/40 split in my favor is fair, as the value decreases faster for you. Let's end this quickly and get our share!
Bob, your offer wasn't fair considering the time pressure. I'm proposing a 55/45 split. Let's be reasonable and close this deal before the value drops further.
Alice, I'm willing to compromise. Let's split the money 55/45 in my favor, acknowledging the time pressure and your decreasing value. This is the best offer I can make.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  Let's just split it 50/50 and call it a day.  Any more time wasted and we both lose out.
